org.wildfly.security.auth.callback

Class SSLCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.auth.callback.SSLCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Callback, ExtendedCallback

    public final class SSLCallback
extends Object
implements ExtendedCallback, Serializable
    A callback which provides information to the callback handler about the established SSL/TLS security layer involved in an authentication.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean isClientMode()
        Determine whether the SSL connection is in "client mode".
        Returns:
